title: Smart Data Models - Smart Data Models - Health - Medical Checks / Patient
description: A patient is the person who goes to the doctor in order to have a medical check.

birthDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date of birth of the patient. Model:'https://schema.org/birthDate'

deathDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date of death of the patient. Model: 'https://schema.org/deathDate'

gender.description: Property. Gender of the patient. Enum: 'male, female'. Model: 'https://schema.org/gender'

race.description: Property. Race of the patient. Enum: 'caucasian, african, central american, asiatic, south american, other'  .

providerBy.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. The IDs of the Doctor who treats the patient

hospitalAt.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. The IDs of the Hospital where the patient is treated. Model:  https://schema.org/Hospital
